ComicInfo.Title: Leaving; Ghost Right; Rick Grimes 2000: Chapter 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
The second chapter of the wildest WALKING DEAD story ever - RICK GRIMES 2000! Plus, the debut of a major new STILLWATER character, surprising coda to the BIRTHRIGHT saga, and the first appearance of EVERYDAY HERO MACHINE BOY!
ContentsRick Grimes 2000 Chapter 2Birthright: Ghost RightEveryday Hero Machine Boy: Summer DazeStillwater: Leaving*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Cliff Rathburn | 1 | B | Cover B | Andrei Bressan & Adriano Lucas | 2 | C | Cover C | Tri Vuong & Irma Kniivila | 3 | D | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover D (Black & White) | Andrei Bressan | 4 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover E (Black & White) | Tri Vuong & Irma Kniivila | 5 | F | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Cover F (Black & White) | Cliff Rathburn | 6 |
